    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kako ravnamo z odpadki?</string>
            <string language="en">Handling the garbage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Handhaben des Abfalls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Manipulation des ordures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Segurando o lixo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Maneggiamento dell'immondizia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χειρισμός των απορριμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Manipulación de la basura</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">S ppt. predstavitvijo ekološko ozavetimo otroke in utrdimo snov o ločenem zbiranju odpadkov, ki nastanejo v vsakdanjem življenju ter pomenu recikliranja le-teh.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of how do we handle garbage (collecting, separating, recycling, ...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ločevanje</string>
            <string language="en">separating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odpadek</string>
            <string language="en">waste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">smeti</string>
            <string language="en">garbage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">recikliranje</string>
            <string language="en">recycling</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung von, wie, handhaben uns Abfall 
(sammelnd, das Trennen, bereitend...) auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation comment  de nous manipulons des 
ordures (se rassemblant, séparation, réutilisant...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação como  dos nós seguramos o lixo 
(coletando, separação, recycling...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione come dei maneggiamo l'immondizia 
(raccogliendo, separare, riciclante...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση για το πώς χειριζόμαστε τα απορρίματα 
(συλλογή, χωρισμός, που ανακυκλώνει...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación cómo lo haga de nosotros manejamos 
la basura (recogiendo, separación, reciclando...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trennen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergeudung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abfall</string>
          </keyword>
